alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 10:58PM EDT until July 12 at 6:20AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Vermont... New Hampshire... Connecticut River AT North Walpole affecting Windsor, Sullivan, Windham and Cheshire Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River at North Walpole. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Extensive flooding occurs along stretches of Route 5, especially in Westminster, affecting homes and businesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 26.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 32.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
